person.persName: Willis Lovelace (Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. and postmaster)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Julia A. Riddle Lovelace in Pendleton County, Kentucky, on February 6, 1834. Father of Sarah Lovelace, Nicholas Lovelace, Zackariah Lovelace, Andrew Jackson Lovelace, Mary A. Lovelace, and Paulina Lovelace. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Pendleton County in 1850. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860. Employed Nicholas Lovelace and Zackariah Lovelace as farm workers in Pendleton County in 1860. Postmaster of Elizabethville, Kentucky, from July 19, 1862, to May 16, 1866.
